data.name: Content Creator's Internet Adventure Demo
data.detailed_description: The Demo of CCIA is just a small taste of the full game, giving you the chance to see if you like it or not, you have 4 playable content creators in this version, RedVacktor, StephOfAnime, JacenSketch and L8sleeper
data.about_the_game: The Demo of CCIA is just a small taste of the full game, giving you the chance to see if you like it or not, you have 4 playable content creators in this version, RedVacktor, StephOfAnime, JacenSketch and L8sleeper
data.short_description: It's a 16bit turn based rpg, what else is there to explain other than it has controller support
